title: Global Inequality Pt 2: Divergence
description: In the second of a two-part look at global inequality Kate & Luigi talk about the downside of globalization. A listener's email sparks a conversation about what's driving the growing wage gap within the U.S. We survey the latest research on the lingering effects of the 'China Shock' and debate how to reverse the trend before the people revolt.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
